== Karamuck (CT) (627847) ==

Karamuck (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 7.23 sq. km. and harbouring 3791 households with total population of 15129 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 285 km. Male population is 7055 and female population is 8074. Scheduled Caste population is 1706 and Scheduled Tribes population is 19. Census Location Code of the town is 627847<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 10 km.
